Package org.apache.wayang.core.optimizer.costs

Class LoadEstimator

java.lang.Object
org.apache.wayang.core.optimizer.costs.LoadEstimator
Direct Known Subclasses:
DefaultLoadEstimator, DynamicLoadEstimator, IntervalLoadEstimator
public abstract class LoadEstimator extends Object
Describes the resource utilization of something executable within an EstimationContext, such as an ExecutionOperator or a FunctionDescriptor.

    Functional interface for lambda expressions to express single-point load estimation functions.

    • calculateJointProbability

      protected double calculateJointProbability(CardinalityEstimate[] inputEstimates, CardinalityEstimate[] outputEstimates)
      Utility method to calculate the probability that all cardinality estimates are correct.
      Parameters:
      inputEstimates - some CardinalityEstimates
      outputEstimates - more CardinalityEstimates
      Returns:
      the joint probability of all CardinalityEstimates being correct

    • enumerateCombinations

      protected long[][] enumerateCombinations(CardinalityEstimate[] cardinalityEstimates)
      Create all possible combination of lower and upper estimates of the given CardinalityEstimates, thereby replacing null values according to replaceNullCardinality(CardinalityEstimate).
      Parameters:
      cardinalityEstimates - the CardinalityEstimates
      Returns:
      the enumerated combinations as two-dimensional long[][]

    • replaceNullCardinality

      protected final CardinalityEstimate replaceNullCardinality(CardinalityEstimate cardinalityEstimate)
      If the given cardinalityEstimate is null then return nullCardinalityReplacement, otherwise cardinalityEstimate.

    • createFallback

      public static DefaultLoadEstimator createFallback(int numInputs, int numOutputs)
      Create a fallback instance. See DefaultLoadEstimator.
      Parameters:
      numInputs - the number of input slots of the estimation subject
      numOutputs - the number of output slots of the estimation subject
      Returns:
      the fallback LoadEstimator
